message.subject: Request from our Mexico City Office
message.content:
M1.1. Margaret,
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. I don't have it.
[Inform: Vince doesn't have something that is not explicitly stated]
M1.3. Maybe we can get a copy directly from the CBOT.
[Inform: Vince thinks a copy of this thing can be obtained directly from the Chicago Board of Trade]
M1.4. Info Central could help.
[Inform: Info Central could help out with this]
